profile_positions.title: Senior Business Developer Child Health and Innovation4Development
Chair of the Board Share-Net International
Director Partnerships and Programmes
Head of Directors Office  MSF OCA

profile_positions.description:
Management Aidsfonds previously STOP AIDS NOW! (2010-today)

Manager Aidsfonds Programmes Children, Youth and Women
Manager STOP AIDS NOW! Programmes
Interim Manager STOP AIDS NOW! Programmes 

Responsibilities
•	Direct reports 13 professionals (project managers, business developer, communication advisor),  indirect project base reports 20+ multi-disciplinary professionals worldwide 
•	Portfolio of ± 10 high impact multi-disciplinary and/or innovative international projects focussed on HIV, co-infections, children, youth and women from a diverse funding base
•	Introduction of Business Development as a way of working
•	Change manager for operationalising strategy “No time to Lose” 2018- 2022 
•	Co-Investigator of the MaxART Phase II Programme: MaxART Effectiveness Study for Early Access to ART for All in Swaziland 

Achievements
•	Transformed the team to a competence, talent and energy focussed team 
•	Agile, effective and professionalized project design and process 
•	Delivered and implemented the portfolio resulting in an increase and diverse funding
•	Building strong aligned and embedded projects with stakeholders worldwide for sustainability
profile_positions.title: Manager Programmes on Children, Youth and Women

profile_positions.description:
•	Project management of high impact multi-disciplinary project in a complex environment 
•	Coalition building and strengthening throughout programme
•	Secretary to the steering committee and international advisory board
•	Lobby and advocate to ensure readiness for scale up

Main achievements
•	High impact has been achieved – trend break as well as change national policies –
•	Secured budget for phase II 
•	Development of high impact multi-disciplinary and/or innovative international projects port folio
•	Conceptualized STOP AIDS NOW!  work on HIV and Livelihoods and mobilized resources
•	Advisor to the WHO Civil Society Consultation Group on ART Consolidated Guidelines
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager MaxART Programme Swaziland

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop, manage and mobilize resources for multi-disciplinary and innovative projects and secured Dreamfund Postcode Lotery
•	Indirect reports of local project coordinators and their teams in India, Uganda and Ethiopia
•	Facilitate and monitor knowledge exchange to stakeholders and beneficiaries
•	Advice the organisation (STI AIDS Netherlands, Aidsfonds and STOP AIDS NOW!) on strategic directions, policy development and programming
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager and Policy Advisor

profile_positions.description:
•	Create and execute sales strategies for essential medicines (70% of working time in Africa) 
•	Direct report of 8 local representatives in Cameroon, Ethiopia, Rwanda, Madagascar, Nigeria, Yemen, Tanzania and Uganda
•	Develop new business and maintain (key) account relationships with Government, UN agencies, Public and Private hospitals and Global Health Initiatives 
•	Deliver on annual revenues and contribution margin objectives
profile_positions.title: Area Manager Africa

profile_positions.description:
•	Manage sales activities diagnostics products and solutions
•	Develop and execute sales strategies fitting the overall marketing and sales targets
•	Deliver on annual revenues and contribution margin objectives
•	Train and product support to ensure smooth implementation of diagnostic systems
profile_positions.title: Account Manager
